headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Gun Van Deals and Free Gusenberg Sweeper
content:
Throw things back to a bygone era of scattershot bullet spread by picking up a free Gusenberg Sweeper from Ammu-Nation or the Gun Van anytime this week.

Plus, take advantage of below-market discounts on a rotating stash of Weapons (10% off), Throwables (15% off) and Armor (20%) by visiting the roaming Gun Van.
